reviews.text: Modern hotel, service and staff were excellent. Breakfast table was abundant with huge variety of drinks and food. Underground garage is good. Nice view on the city, very close to BTC shopping area.

We stayed with my husband for two nights in this hotel. Everything was perfect. Breakfast was amazing. In particular, fresh juices, fruits and vegetables, crepes, pancakes, salty food, cheese and also tea and coffee. Parking was free and covered. Distance from the centre is 10 minutes by car. Next to the hotel is the biggest shopping centre in Europe. We would come back again.

The best hotel in Ljubljana with good service and excellent breakfast. The lobby bar has delicious food. A little life hack. The elevator near the lobby bar is always full, and the reception is always free.

Very good surprise this hotel. Good service, nice breakfast. We had requested last minute baby cot and we had received it. Also guys made for us upgrade.
There is big parking. It was not clear when we made a booking if it would be included or not but we paid for it. Nevermind. Also we couldn't find a bar in the roof. But everything eas very clean and we received exactly was we had expected. Thann you.
Windows do not open. The bed is comfortable and the shower is nice. The breakfast is rich and there’s enough space for people. The cocktails at the bar as subpar compared to the charged price.
